Description: User authentication, role-based access control, and security features. Implement secure login system with JWT tokens, password encryption using bcrypt, role management for HR_ADMIN and HR_RECRUITER, session management with 30-minute timeout, and password reset functionality.

Upload CVs, parse content, and extract candidate information. Build CV upload system supporting PDF/TXT/DOCX formats, implement batch file upload with drag-and-drop, create NLP-based text extraction for skills/experience/education, match skills to taxonomy, and store CV files and metadata.

Create and manage job positions with required skills. Implement CRUD operations for job positions, allow defining required and preferred skills, set experience and education requirements, track job status (open/closed), and link candidates to jobs.

Match candidates to jobs and rank by compatibility. Develop intelligent matching algorithm using skills matching, experience weighting, education consideration, configurable weights, calculate match score 0-100%, provide ranking explanations, and export rankings.

Generate insights and reports on candidates and hiring. Create comprehensive reporting dashboard with top skills frequency report, candidate pipeline statistics, time-to-hire metrics, skills gap analysis, PDF/CSV export, date range filtering, and visual charts.

Track all system activities for compliance and debugging. Implement complete audit trail logging all CRUD operations, user logins, data access, capture IP and timestamp, provide searchable audit logs, export capability, and retention policy.

User interface for all system features. Build responsive web interface with main dashboard, navigation menu, responsive design for mobile/desktop, data visualizations, quick action buttons, user profile section, and system notifications.
